name: Manifestation of Terror
description: Conceal two sinister traps, one at the targeted location and another next to you, which take 2 seconds to arm and last for 1 minute.  When each trap is triggered, a dark spirit is summoned to terrify up to 6 enemies, causing them to cower in fear for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Creates two traps instead, which fear enemies when triggered.
rawDescription:
Conceal two sinister traps, one at the targeted location and another next to you, which take |cffffff2|r seconds to arm and last for <<1>>.

When each trap is triggered, a dark spirit is summoned to terrify up to |cffffff6|r enemies, causing them to cower in fear for <<2>>.
